name: Tiresias's Misadventures
description:
Who is the player?

  • They are the goddess of earth and guidance Gaia. They have reign over the land and some of what is contained within it.

What is their goal?

  • Gaia is attempting to help the blind prophet Tiresias to an exit in the area before him.

So why is that so hard?

  • Gaia cannot speak to or directly control Tiresias. She can only try to guide his movements.

What can they do?

  • Gaia can summon a limited number of different blocks, called pillars and anti-pillars, and place them in areas that Tiresias will run into.

Thanks for checking out our game! If you have any suggestions or bugs, or just want a rad conversation, contact us at shelflifegames@gmail.com
